title: Can anyone prepare a timetable to crack the NEET 2021 within 2 months? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm a NEET aspirant. I set a proper time table for the preparation of my exam. But during this covid time I couldn't go to coaching centre. So so I started to prepare from self and also ask the help for teachers. I have so many friends with the same aim . We were together make regular group calls started to making notes and clearing our doubts through online Google classrooms. one of our best teacher recommended us to buy second hand books of NCERT from MyPustak. As we now that NCERT books can help a lot to making notes. mypustak providing free books to everyone. We need to give the shipping charges only. it is affordable in range. MyPustak#free books#ncert books.
